trans-unit.source: . Rather than provide a simple description of a new data type, Archetype schemas do the actual work and heavy lifting involved in using the new type. Archetype Schemas serve as easy extension points for other developers as project specific components can be created and bound or you can choose among the rich existing set of features.
trans-unit.target: . Rather than provide a simple description of a new data type, Archetype schemas do the actual work and heavy lifting involved in using the new type. Archetype Schemas serve as easy extension points for other developers as project specific components can be created and bound or you can choose among the rich existing set of features.

trans-unit.target: Added uninstall profile. Most importantly this removes the

trans-unit.target: Problem: refactoring plone.app.widgets is not easy with too detailed expectations on the output of the pattern_options. Its also outside the scope of this test. Solution: check if there are pattern_options, but now what they are exactly. [jensens] (#124)
